long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear Touch Collage app allows you to mirror your Chromebook to the Clear Touch Panel. Collage is a great tool for sharing your screen and content on a larger screen and even supports up to 4 Chromebooks to be shared side by side on the Clear Touch Panel.
